entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
